resources.string: The largest planet in the solar system is Jupiter
The first Olympic Games were held in Athens, Greece
Sound spreads faster in the water than in the air

HUAWEI Analytics Kit (hereinafter referred to as Analytics Kit or Kit) offers a rich array of preset analytics models that help you gain an in-depth insight into your users, products, and content. With this insight, you can then take a data-driven approach to make informed decisions for product and marketing optimizations.

Such events can be automatically collected without extra coding. The system event collection function is automatically enabled during initiation. The event ID of an automatically collected event is a reserved field of the analysis service and cannot be reused.

Enhanced e-commerce allows you to analyze interactions between users and products in the shopping process, including viewing the product list, tapping products, browsing product details, adding products to favorites, adding products to the shopping cart, removing products from the shopping cart, purchasing products, paying for purchased products, and applying for a refund.

string.name: automatically_collected_events_text
string.u: Click here to get more information about automatically collected events.

resources.string: Such events can be used to meet personalized analysis requirements that cannot be met by automatically collected events and predefined events. You may have personalized events that need to be collected and analyzed. Analytics Kit allows you to customize events and extend event parameters, or add personalized parameters for predefined events.
In this example, we are defining a special event such as a quiz. We collect the user\'s response.

Such events have been predefined by the Analytics SDK based on common application scenarios. It is recommended you use predefined event IDs for event collection and analysis. The system has been enabled to provide various insight reports based on predefined events.
In this example, we collect user scores by using the predefined Score event, according to the points they get from the answers given by the user in the custom event.
